markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Deadly Strikes](/Feats.aspx?ID=1762) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=112" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 131 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You have honed your body to attack with lethal focus. Your unarmed attacks gain the [deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174) trait, or you increase their deadly trait to d10 if the unarmed attack is already deadly with a smaller die size.
name: Deadly Strikes
